Key Match Events: New York Knicks guard Landry Shamet suffered a serious shoulder injury during their 111-105 preseason victory over the Charlotte Hornets.
Shamet injured his right shoulder reaching for a steal on an entry pass during the third quarter and did not return to the game.
TJ Warren scored 11 points and grabbed seven rebounds in 19 minutes of action against Charlotte.
Post-Match Reflections: Head coach Tom Thibodeau praised Landry Shamet for having a terrific camp throughout the preseason.
The Knicks will likely have to replace Shamet on the active roster and potentially his spot in the rotation due to his injury.
